example.eg: The bus passed me without stopping.
example.egtrans: 公交车从我身边开过，没有停车。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经过, 走过, 路过

example.eg: First you need to pass customs, then you have to wait for your luggage.
example.egtrans: 先要过海关，然后还得等着取行李。

example.eg: The racecar passed his opponent at the last minute to win the race.
example.egtrans: 这辆赛车在最后关头超过对手，赢得比赛。

example.eg: Could you please pass the salt?
example.egtrans: 能把盐递给我吗？

example.eg: He passed the pen to her.
example.egtrans: 他把钢笔递给了她。

example.eg: She passed her driving test on her first attempt.
example.egtrans: 她第一次就通过了驾驶考试。

example.eg: The law was passed by a vote of seventy to thirty.
example.egtrans: 该项法规以七十票对三十票获得通过。

example.eg: I passed the test!
example.egtrans: 我通过了考试！

example.eg: The bus passed without stopping for us.
example.egtrans: 那辆公交车径直驶过，没有为我们而停车。

dsense.name: pass
dsense.guideword: (I don't know the answer) (表示不知道答案)

example.eg: "Jenna, what's the answer to number twelve?" "Pass."
example.egtrans: “詹娜，第十二题的答案是什么？”“过。”

example.eg: There is a pass through the mountains thirty kilometres north of here.
example.egtrans: 离这儿往北30公里处有一个通过群山的山口。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 山口, 垭口, 关隘

example.eg: Be careful when kayaking through the pass.
example.egtrans: 在河道内划皮划艇时，请一定小心。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 水渠, 水道, 航道, 河道

example.eg: He showed his summer pass and was admitted to the pool.
example.egtrans: 他出示了自己的夏季通行证，可以进入泳池了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通行证, 进入许可证

example.eg: He achieved ten straight passes in his exams.
example.egtrans: 他的十场考试全都通过了。

example.eg: His sister got a first class degree, but he only got a pass.
example.egtrans: 他妹妹获得了一级学位，他只获得了普通学士学位。

example.eg: The pass was intercepted by the opponent.
example.egtrans: 传出的球被对方截获。

example.eg: The pass of the psychic's hand over the table seemed to set off a strange series of events.
example.egtrans: 巫师做出的手势似乎引发了一连串奇怪的事件。

example.eg: The tabletop conjuror amazed us with his passes.
example.egtrans: 桌面魔术师巧妙的手法让我们大吃一惊。

example.eg: Becky wasn't interested in Tom and pretended she hadn't even noticed his pass.
example.egtrans: 贝基对汤姆不感兴趣，甚至假装自己没有注意到他的调情。

example.eg: The soldier was granted a pass to attend his mother's funeral.
example.egtrans: 士兵拿到一张休假证去参加母亲的葬礼。

example.eg: What has brought us to such a pass in our relationship?
example.egtrans: 是什么让我们的感情到了这样一个关口。

example.eg: The birthday card passed from person to person.
He passed, then ran towards the goal.
It seems that time passes faster every year.
example.egtrans: 时间的流逝似乎会逐年加快。

example.eg: They agreed to forget all that had passed before and start anew.
You can either play a card or pass.
example.egtrans: 你可以选择出牌或者不要。

example.eg: That opportunity has now passed.
example.egtrans: 那个机会已经没有了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结束, 终止, 消失

example.eg: I'm sorry to tell you that your husband has passed.
example.egtrans: 很遗憾地告诉你，你丈夫过世了。

example.eg: "How was the test?" "I passed!"
example.egtrans: “考试结果如何？”“我通过了！”

example.eg: Sharon passed from intermediate to advanced level when she was learning Spanish.
They passed each other while running errands this morning.
To play well as part of a team, it's important to pass the ball, rather than just keeping it to yourself.
The student's grades were much better this year, so the teacher was happy to pass him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让…通过考试, 让…及格

example.eg: They say it is painful to pass a kidney stone.
example.egtrans: 他们说通过尿液排出肾结石是很痛的。

example.eg: The columnist passed judgement against the candidate's plans.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发表对…的批评, 对…作出评论

example.eg: The judge passed a sentence of five years' imprisonment on the criminal.
The rocket's speed quickly passed two hundred kilometres per hour.
They passed the popcorn around the table.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 传, 传递, 传播, 散播

example.eg: He passed the basketball to his teammate, then his teammate shot it.
example.egtrans: 他把球传给队友，随即队友就投篮了。

example.eg: After the king's death, the power passed into the hands of his son.
All passengers must present their boarding passes before entering the airplane.
example.egtrans: 登机前，所有乘客都必须出示登机卡。

example.eg: The truck driver bypassed the small towns in order to arrive quicker.
example.egtrans: 为了快一点到达目的地，卡车司机绕过了那个小镇。

example.eg: We took the bypass because it's quicker.
example.egtrans: 我们抄了旁路，这样近一点。

example.eg: The package includes free passes to all the park attractions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 免费入场, 免费票, 免费入场券

example.eg: We were issued with guest passes for the VIP area.
Don't be caught out of class without a hall pass!
Let the waiter through.
example.egtrans: 让水流过去。

example.eg: Jeremy let Liz's rude comment pass because he did not want to argue with her.
He was disciplined for sexual harassment after he made a pass at one of the secretaries.
The soldier did not pass inspection for parade duty because his uniform was dirty.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不行, 没有通过, 不被接受

example.eg: I did not pass my exams, so I will have to take them again.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 考试失败, 没通过考试

example.eg: In 1647 Parliament passed a law making the celebration of Christmas illegal.

dsense.name: pass an exam
dsense.guideword: abbr (be successful in a formal test)

example.eg: Once you have passed the exam you will be awarded with a diploma.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通过考试, 考试及格

dsense.name: pass [sth] around, pass around [sth], also UK: pass [sth] round, pass round [sth]

example.eg: They passed around sandwiches and drinks at the party.

dsense.name: pass [sth] around [sth], also UK: pass [sth] round [sth]

example.eg: Please sign the petition and pass it round the office.
He could easily pass for his brother, they look so much alike.
A baby can pass gas up to 20 times a day.

dsense.name: pass judgment, also UK: pass judgement

example.eg: We shouldn't pass judgement on him; he's doing the best that he can.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作出批评, 作出负面评价

dsense.name: pass judgment, also UK: pass judgement

example.eg: I won't pass judgement until I've heard the whole story.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给出判断, 作出评判

example.eg: The proposals are defective and will not pass muster.
The quiz contestant passed on two questions.
Unfortunately, you have passed on the last five payments and are heavily in debt.
I've been secretary of this club for too long: it's time to pass on the torch to someone else.
He never admits to his mistakes at work but always passes the buck instead.

dsense.name: pass the hat, pass the hat round

example.eg: After the buskers had stopped playing, they passed the hat round.
The children were playing a game of pass the parcel.

dsense.name: pass the parcel
dsense.guideword: UK, informal, figurative (pass on unwanted responsibility)

example.eg: None of the government departments want to deal with the problem; they just keep passing the parcel.
It took us 20 minutes to pass through the Mont Blanc Tunnel.
Glass allows light to pass through.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 穿过, 通过, 经过

dsense.name: pass-through, passthrough
dsense.guideword: (opening between rooms) (常开在厨房与客厅之间)

dsense.name: pass-through, passthrough
dsense.guideword: (company: not subject to income tax) (公司)

dsense.name: pass-through, passthrough
dsense.guideword: (window, etc.: opening between rooms) (两个房间之间的)

example.eg: We are having a pass-through window fitted between the kitchen and the dining room.
Carol was doing a crossword to pass the time.
The events passed unnoticed, until someone wrote to the local paper about them.
Bob used his passkey to open several doors in the office building.
You can save a lot of money if you buy a season pass.
The transit pass allows you to travel on all the city's buses with a discounted fare.
